official_title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to allow remarried widows, widowers, and surviving divorced spouses to become or remain entitled to widow's or widower's insurance benefits if the prior marriage was for at least 10 years.
short_title: Remarried Widows' and Widowers' Benefits Act of 2003
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Remarried Widows' and Widowers' Benefits Act of 2003 - Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) (OASDI) of the Social Security Act (SSA) to allow remarried widows, widowers, and surviving divorced spouses to become or remain entitled to widow's or widower's insurance benefits if the prior marriage was for at least ten years.

titles.title: Remarried Widows' and Widowers' Benefits Act of 2003
